Text:

so can anyone ,, tell us what this is and if it works !!!
usually each song has its own .dat file ,, this download has only 1 file !!!!,, PLUS  IS THERE A HOLLIDAY PACK FOR PC,,,  ON DOWNLOAD SITE FOR ROCKSMITH IT ONLY SHOWS THE PACK FOR PS3 AND XBOX ( NO PC ) ??????
